text: Usman Tariq Khawaja (born 18 December 1986) is an Australian cricketer. He has played for Australia and Queensland. Khawaja started playing first-class cricket for New South Wales in 2008. He played his first international (involving the whole world) match for Australia in January 2011. Khawaja was born in Pakistan and moved to Australia with his family when he was five. He has played county cricket in the United Kingdom. For a short time, he played in the Indian Premier League and the Pakistan Super League. ==References== Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Australian cricketers
title: Usman Khawaja
